snippet.title: Exiler | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Exiler is an atmospheric horror quest with interactive comic elements. Take a role of Adam Wayne, an exorcist. Embark on a journey from an apathetic detective pursuing his own benefit to a person capable of selfless help and compassion. Set traps, use a wide array of exorcist tools, combine them, and create unique cleansing rites for different types of evil spirits. Everything you do unlocks vibrant visuals and action-packed interactive comic book sequences that shed light on the tragic story of Adam Wayne.

Playtest Exiler on Steam: https://s.team/a/2197240
